attributes.action: Expand Dartford River Crossing local resident scheme To cover Brentwood, Romford, Bexley & Gravesend
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign get the government to Expand The Local Residents’ Discount Scheme at the Dartford / Essex crossing to cover councils Brentwood, Romford, Bexley & Gravesend.

You can get cheaper crossings with the local residents scheme BUT only if you live with in Dartford & Thurrock Council boundaries.

This October 2014 or When the tolls go & its Free Flowing
Cars will have to pay £2.50 per crossing,
& go up to £3 for two-axle vehicles
and £6 for HGVs

Its NOT Free to use & this is for a single crossing.

Can we get enough people to sign this so the government have to look at this we need this petition must reach 100,000 signatures within 30 days.

Please sign up and spread the word we can make a change use Twitter RT, Facebook, Phone anything.

This is people who live Brentwood, Romford, Bexley & Gravesend & have put up with the traffic jams for many years !

Have never had the benefit of discount travel because they live in the wrong side of the council boundary
